description.value:
This +2 striking frost staff is an heirloom that was gifted to Alzarius by his mother when he made his choice to remain in Xer. It is a gift he claims has been handed down through generations of spellcasters in his family.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Frostbite]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Environmental Endurance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Environmental Endurance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Slow], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Wind]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ice Storm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Vapor Form]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Environmental Endurance], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Howling Blizzard], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Ice]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
